Package org.example

Class IncMatrixGraph<V>

java.lang.Object
org.example.AbstractGraph<V>
org.example.IncMatrixGraph<V>
Type Parameters:
V - the type of the vertices.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph<V>
public class IncMatrixGraph<V> extends AbstractGraph<V>
An incidence matrix graph representation.

    • getNeighbors

      public Set<V> getNeighbors(V vertex)
      Description copied from interface: Graph
      Retrieves a set of closest neighbors for a given vertex. A neighbor is a vertex that can be reached by a direct edge from the given vertex.
      Parameters:
      vertex - the vertex whose neighbors to find.
      Returns:
      a set of neighboring vertices, or null if the vertex is not in the graph.
